title: Have the Vandal skins ever been taken out of the vault?
body: If so, when? I want Vandal Twitch so bloody bad...

replies.body: It doesn't look like Vandal Twitch has been released back to the store in a bit, but since it's a Legacy Skin there should still be a chance of getting him in hextech chests.
Can you infinitely reroll hextech chests? lol
